sourcesContent:
import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; export const UserCard = ({ username, tag, location, avatar, stats }) => { return (

{username}

{tag}

{location}

  • Followers {stats.followers}
  • Views {stats.views}
  • Likes {stats.likes}
); } UserCard.propTypes = { avatar: PropTypes.string.isRequired, username: PropTypes.string.isRequired, tag: PropTypes.string.isRequired, location: PropTypes.string.isRequired, stats: PropTypes.exact({ followers: PropTypes.number.isRequired, views: PropTypes.number.isRequired, likes: PropTypes.number.isRequired, }).isRequired }
